item.description:
This unique and festive parade dispenses with unruly marching bands and instead instructs participants to carry boom boxes tuned to AM 1400, which will be playing marching music. We hope to show a large atheist presence, so please invite all your freethinking friends!

Meet at Jillson Square on Main St at 9:00 am. Participants MUST be there at this time to register (there is no pre-registration). The parade begins at 11:00 am and runs 7/10 mile.

Participants must wear red, white and blue (which happen to be the colors of the CVA t-shirt) and should bring battery-powered radios if you have them.

Further info:
http://www.meetup.com/atheists-727/events/22707141/

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: CVA Marches in Willimantic Boom Box Parade
